```{r, include=FALSE}

#### Load libraries ####
library(dplyr)
library(RPostgreSQL)
library(flextable)
library(officer)

#### Add database connection ####
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

conn <- connect_to_db("racecounts")
con <- connect_to_db("rda_shared_data")
options(scipen = 999)

```

```{r, include=FALSE}

data <- read.csv("W:/Data/Crime and Justice/CA DOJ/Hate_Crimes/2001_2023/Hate-2001-2023.csv")

```

```{r, include=FALSE}

df <- data %>% select(RecordId, MostSeriousBias) %>% filter(MostSeriousBias %in% c("Anti-Arab", "Anti-Islamic (Muslim)", "Anti-Jewish")) %>% group_by(MostSeriousBias) %>% summarize(hate_crimes=n())

```

```{r, include=FALSE}

dbDisconnect(conn)
```
